What is the Dashboard? â€‹

The Dashboard is the first screen you see after a successful admin login. It gives a quick snapshot of the overall system â€” offering real-time insights on assets, users, and locations. It helps Admins monitor activities at a glance without needing to navigate deeper into other modules.
